Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/top

Synopsis Top, vertical, alignment.
Function FProperty top()
Description top defines top vertical alignment. It sets the vertical alignment to 0.

Note that
  • top() is equivalent to valign(0.0).
Also see align, valign and CompositionModel.
